summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; authorizing the Seattle Center Director to execute and deliver deed(s) to portions of the donated "Kreielsheimer Property" accepted pursuant to Ordinance 112729, and to assign the City's option rights acquired under the Gift Assignment of Option accepted pursuant to Ordinance 116734, in order to convey designated portions of the same to one or more third parties as required by the donor of such property interests.
